summary: Documentary about women working in factories during WWII and resultant loss of jobs after the war. Five women tell their stories. Fascinating clips of racist, sexist propaganda of the era.
cast: Lola Weixel|Margaret Wright|Lyn Childs|Gladys Belcher|Wanita Allen|Betty Allie|Marynia Farnham|Franklin D. Roosevelt
keywords: national film registry|f rated|triple f rated|title directed by female|world war two
title: The Life and Times of Rosie the Riveter
